definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Electrophoretic coating process on the aluminium alloy support used for solar energy heat unit is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了太陽能熱水器鋁合金托架的電泳塗漆工藝。

sentences.english: In combination with the above, solar evacuated tubes provide for the domestic hot water needs.
sentences.chinese: 結合上述，採用太陽能真空集熱管爲家裏提供熱水。

sentences.english: 3 applies to solar and wind-powered lighting.
sentences.chinese: 應用於太陽能和風能供電照明。

sentences.english: First, let's examine the parts of which a solar panel consists.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我們來看一看太陽能集熱板包括的各個部件。

sentences.english: The amount of solar energy hitting its high-latitude location is now roughly the same as it was when it shut down.
sentences.chinese: 如今到達高緯度地區的太陽能與其關閉時的大致相當。

sentences.english: Solar cookers, or ovens , have been used for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能飲具或爐竈已經被用了幾百年。

sentences.english: The solar industry has clear differences from the auto industry, of course.
sentences.chinese: 自然，太陽能產業與汽車產業有着明顯的不同。

sentences.english: The problem with these early prototypes is they have a very low light-to-electricity conversion rate.
sentences.chinese: 雛形太陽能電池的問題在於光到電的轉換率太低。

sentences.english: Info on the size of the solar and pumped water storage system is not available yet.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能系統和泵送蓄水系統的具體尺寸目前尚未公佈。

sentences.english: The most common by far is photosynthetic plants that capture solar energy.
sentences.chinese: 最普遍的是一些吸收太陽能進行光合作用的植物。

sentences.english: With higher sun light transmittance , can raise photoelectric transformation efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能透過率高，提高電池的光電轉換效率。

sentences.english: And they say there are 12 solar cells built into its wings.
sentences.chinese: 技術人員稱，飛機的兩翼內置有12塊太陽能電池。

sentences.english: Today, China is the largest exporter of solar panels in the world.
sentences.chinese: 現在中國已成爲世界最大的太陽能電池板出口國。

sentences.english: Generating solar power in the UK involves a spectacular waste of scarce resources.
sentences.chinese: 在英國使用太陽能發電，是對稀缺資源的巨大浪費。

sentences.english: I hope to solarize my house within 5 years.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能用太陽能給我的房間供熱五年。

sentences.english: Here it is. It’s a solar-powered plane.
sentences.chinese: 看，這就是，一架太陽能飛機。

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
a power station/an electricity generating plant
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
